name: Killing Zombies
description: Surrounded by darkness, and undead creatures coming in from all angles. As the resistant soldier, you have been assigned to do one thing â€“ kill them all. Killing Zombies is a 4 player online co-op horror survival shooter for the HTC Vive, with wave-driven VR gameplay from Front Range Software.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Virtual Reality Capable System
